title: League fails to open after champ select.
body:
Ever since Patch 6.20, every time I finish a champ select, the client closes as per usual then tries to launch the game, but I'm getting an application error. "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000142). Click OK to close the application."

I'm running Windows 7 64 bit, and I've tried to restart my computer, run AVG/Avast/CCleaner, defragged, everything on the Bug Splat list, running from a different installation on a separate drive, all while attempting to repair and/or reinstall League at several different points in the "Fix" process. 

Can't really think of anything else to try, so I figured I'd ask here. Thanks in advance for the help.

replies.body: This error may indicate a driver or hardware problem that's failing to render the game.  I know you've done some troubleshooting so far, but those would mostly resolve security setting issues and not with your drivers.  I highly recommend going over the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this as well as update necessary drivers/products.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I've already tried everything in the game crash guide, and none of it worked, which is why I'm here.
